content.detailedDescription: It happened to me. this happened twice. the first time the orb was almost black. it was spherical but it really had no shape. it was quite amorphous. it did buzz when it flew off. i flew up from my chest area and dissipated into thin air. my heart was racing, and i had this strange panic attack out of nowhere. i just went back to sleep. i tried hard to focus my eyes on it as it floated away, but it just disappeared. it was so strange. the second occurrence, the same stuff happened, but the object was red that time.
content.summary: The orb appeared to be lifting from my chest and i woke up startled, heart racing for no reason.

content.detailedDescription:
October25th 2014,
                   at 10 a.M. i observed 8 blackhawk helicopters flying in the diamond formation 4/4 4/4 . after this we experienced electrical disturbances with our cell phone and satelite t.V. sound . also our water heater element burned out , this is important because our landlord has a cabin behind or property she informed us that the water heater at cabin was also burned out.
 
november 2nd 2014 , 
                    11:00 p.M. i was watching tv . my dogs were barking their warning bark. woke up my son to go check out with me why they were being on alert. when we stepped out of our home one dogs was barking and the other was whimpering. we went around to the back of our home to check looked around with flashlights for some time found nothing ,  the flashlights were really not needed because the moon was shining brightly. when we turned around to check the front yard we realized that  something human like was watching us beside a large cedar tree in my front yard it appeared to blend in with the surrondings some how, the dogs saw it at the same time, he and i did , he is 18 yrs old . we took off after it , when the being moved it disturbed nesting birds in the tree. my son went left and 
i went right after circumventing the tree all we found was disturbed grass and impression in it. we stood there dumbfounded for a few minutes trying to figure out what we had just saw. then we went towards the house , to go in . when we did our dogs took off running into back potato field. also i need to add that several dogs in our community were howling as well!!!!! 
 
november 6th 2014 . . as of today we are still having electrical disturbances with our cell phones in the form of a pop or click interuption , the same sound comes through our t.V. interupting out programming. 

our landlord also informed us that the area is plagued with some typr of electrical phenomenoma .
content.summary: My son and i witnessed a being with some typr of blending or cloaking device.

content.detailedDescription:
By the end of the noon, i was trying to take some photos of the sky by its colours when, suddenly, i saw the oject.
so i took the photo right on the object
when i noticed the object i guessed it would be a helicopter
the object was comingo due to south from san salvador vulcano, suddenly but slowly change its direction right to the east and i can't see anymore because here it's a residential area and other houses don't let see it anymore
well, i was happy to see a rare object
because it's a residential area, other houses don't let see a little more the traffic of the object

the video that i attached was filmed from other point about 12 kilometers from i was
content.summary: I was trying to take some photos to the sky when i saw the object

content.detailedDescription: I was taking random photo's outside my plane window. there was a quick very very bright light as i was taking the photo. the light lasted a milasecond. i almost thought i did not see anything till i looked at the picture.I was in 747 heading to la airport when it happened.
content.summary: Coming out of a worm hole

content.detailedDescription: I was bursting crackers on the eve of diwali from my rooftop. i then saw some sources of lights coming from the west. after nearing me the stopped and started hovering around the place. i shot few rockets into the air two of which were absorbed by it.It kept on hovering there for 1.5hours.
content.summary: Observing the crckers

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday evening, 11/2/2014, i went on a ce-5 outing on the border of auburn hills, mi and rochester, mi.
the group met at the organizers house in auburn hills.
when we were heading out to the cars to make half mile journey to our selected field, we noticed the skies were perfectly clear. an excellent night to be star gazing.
it was fairly bright as the moon was overhead and about 70% full.
we drove to the site, which was only a 1/2 mile or so away.
we again looked skyward and this time commented on 3 chemtrails being visible.
we grabbed our chairs and walked a couple hundred feet to the middle of the field and set up our chairs and blankets. that process couldn't have taken more than 15 minutes.
as soon as we were situated, we again looked up, but now there were 15 chemtrails blanketing the sky. the entire sky was nearly completely obscured.
i brought along night vision recording equipment just for the occasion, so i began recording and continued recording most of the time we were out there.
somewhere about 30 minutes in to the session i saw a triangle craft appear from the north on a southerly trajectory. it was emitting light from each of its 3 corners (as you'll see in the attached video "auburn hills"). its altitude seemed to be at least several thousand feet. i called out that i saw an inbound triangle and the guy next to me tried frantically to see what i was talking about. he didn't have any light enhancing devices and never ended up seeing the craft.
we remained in the field until about 9:15pm when we were collectively too cold to remain much longer. there were no more incidents that were noticed during that time.
the next day (monday, 11/3/2014) i went through the recordings to show the craft to the others who didn't see it.
the following day (tuesday, 11/4/2014) i was considering making a story on the chemtrails, so i started looking for a good representative sections to pull from the recordings.
i hadn't reviewed more than 5 minutes of video when i saw what looked like a huge craft moving behind the clouds. i then created a program to step through the frames one at a time so i could see what was going on. it ended up being that what looked like a huge stealth craft was instead 2 more fast moving lights. they came in on parallel trajectories from the top of the video and split off towards the center (as you should be able to see in the attached video "hidden ufos"). since i didn't notice the crafts during recording, i panned away earlier than i would have liked had i known they were there. if you step through the frames, you can see the lower craft initiating a hard bank to its left when i'm starting to turn away.

i returned home at exactly 10:00pm. upon arrival i noticed the skies were perfectly clear, not a single cloud or chemtrail overhead at all. i looked back in the direction of the field we were at and noticed a thick cloud (chemtrail) layer starting around the pontiac area.

if these had been caused from passenger jet exhaust, the trails would extend across the entire sky. but these were all contained in a tight group blanketing the auburn hills and rochester areas, and likely extended beyond the range i personally witnessed.

i know it's up to you, the investigator to put the pieces together and nobody is supposed to draw any conclusions, but...
i've spent time on many nights looking at the stars looking for non-ordinary phenomenon. it is a rare occasion to actually see anything at all. when there are 3 craft in two separate encounters within 30 minutes of each other is beyond coincidence. now considering the clouds that were specifically created (being chemtrails) and only over a relatively localized area, and there was a flurry of advanced technology overhead, it is undeniable that the chemtrails were anything but specifically placed there to shield us from seeing what was going on overhead.

taking that one step further, what exactly are they filling the atmosphere with (that we all end up having to breath) to support these false cloud banks???

(here comes the only speculation...)
since these didn't exhibit out of this world maneuvering capabilities, i am hesitant to say they were of alien manufacture. their speed and triangle shape indicates advanced technology which are within reach of our black projects, so all of this seems likely to be a military coverup of alien technology.
content.summary: Multiple unknown objects over rochester mi

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were traveling south east on interstate 94 at around 4am back in june 1982 about 20 east of saint cloud. we noticed a light following along side us i flashed the headlights 3 times it flashed back 3 times. my brother said they want to talk to us. we pulled of the interstate heading south on a tar we turned on a gravel and there were heavy trees on each side of the road we came out of the trees and there it was hovering up in the sky.It was round disc shaped with different colored lights flashing! it seemed to be a few hundred feet off the ground. we got out and looked at it. a smaller ball shaped craft surrounded  by a cloud  came down to the car by us my brother tried to touch it i felt like it x-ray me after a few minutes the ball went back into the ship and it took off into space. we haven't said anything about this for years people just laugh at you anyway. but this really happened and it would be interesting to here what we would say under hypnosis..
content.summary: My brother and i were traveling late at night and we were the only car on the interstate at 4am we saw a light following the car and we flashed our lights at it 3 times it flashed back 3 times.

content.detailedDescription: Broken arrow lights up in the sky. just hovering no sound. no movement. four red lights. turned clear.
content.summary: Broken arrow lights up in the sky. just hovering no sound. no movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home with my son from mcdonalds just after dark.  i noticed what looked like 3 vry bright lights just hovering just above the tree line (which was what caught my attention,  it was just a bit higher than the light post)  i was thinking to myself that is too low for a helicopter,  they aren't allowed to hover so close plus  my window was down and didn't hear anything,  which i had thought to myself,  that low i would have certainly been able to hear it. but no.  as we approached it and passed it  i could see a perfect triangle  no curves anywhere and it was black, so black it  made the dusky sky look blue   against it.The lights that i thought was in a row at a distance were i guess the three white lights on each corner, and a red one in the center.  just looked very different from when i first spotted it.  still very silent as we passed.  my son by this time was concerned, upset with me cause i was more curious than scared. he still doesn't like to talk about it. i decided to do a u turn about qrtr mileifrom the sighting,  it was totally gone by the time i returned to the area.  nothing was in the sky, no plae no helicopters etc.  made me think maybe i just imagined it,  but i remind myself my son was also a witness that i wasn't alone .. he saw it too  whether he thrilled about it or not. i had believed that there could be et out there,  but never was one to believe in triangle ufo>  until i saw it... came back home turned on computer,  pulled up black triangle and was amazed how it matched, i didn't know much at all about them at the time.  i have had a couple other things happen here behind house.. that i can't explain... strobe light beams coming thru my bedroom window,  i also have a witness for that too.  scared him,  he kept asking me what that was ,.. it was the second time that had happened but the first time i was alone,  i didn't know what to tell him.  so i sat silent for a bit trying to figure something out to say. how does one explain this?  when i don't know either.  had another incident where there was a deep deep hum over or around the house,  (this happend before i had my triangle sightig) eventually my tv shut off and my bulldog which was laying at the bottom of my bed  she jumped off bed timidly and when i got up to turn a light on i was in the dark,  i ran into to her standing where i laying facing the back wall,  same wall couple years later that the lights would beam ito room.  she was scared.  then i heard a sound like someone hit the wall behind where the tv is.  no idea what all the other personal experiences boil down too, but i do know what i saw . something else came up when my oldest son came home literally right  after me and my younges son returned home from sighting,  i told my youngest don't tell anyone,  lets not get ridiculed,  but my oldest came in and was excited cause he said he just some kind out of this world fast light shooting in the sky , so my son and i told him what we had just saw ourselves   not sure if its the same object.  had i not seen what i saw,  i would have thought he just saw a shooting star. but since we had just saw what we saw,  i can't be sure what my oldest saw.
content.summary: Black perfect triangle three white lights and one red light in middle beaming down ,  i was driving home with my son  just after dark   he saw it too.  he was bothered more emotionally than i    i was thrilled to see it,  he wasn't. it scared him.

content.detailedDescription: Plane was a little loud and at a medium distance from me. close enough for me the see two small 'wings' at the nose area and close enough to distinguish what was apparently twin jet engines.  perhaps nothing unusual, but it was not something i recall having seen in the past.
content.summary: Plane or drone?  twin jets.  hammerhead front 'wings'.  one set of primary wings.  i've never seen one before.

content.detailedDescription: On the 20th of september 2014, i was at santa monica pier in los angeles in holidays from australia. i have now come home and found on my mobile phone, photo camera and video camera these three round spheres in triangle form in the blue sky. one appears to be reflecting the sun more than the other two. i remember not seeing anything flying in the sky at the time and it was a beautiful clear day. you may need to zoom in to notice the spheres but once you find them you will see the three spheres clearly.
content.summary: 3 spheres hovering in a triangle form over santa monica pier america

content.detailedDescription: I was on duty driving my work vehicle westbound on a main thoroughfare toward the western part of the city.  it was already dark outside and i first noticed the object as it appeared to be a solid red light low in the sky, and it appeared that it was slowly moving from west to east.  i first thought it was an aircraft as there are many training aircraft in the area during the night and day.  as i drove further westbound i noticed that it didn't have any white or red flashing strobes or red or green navigation lights.  i stopped my vehicle on a side street, exited my vehicle and continued to observe the object.  i could not hear any sound coming from this object though there were cars traveling down the main thoroughfare that i had exited.  i estimated the object to be between 500 to 1000 ft. in the sky.  as i watched, it appeared to hover in place, pulsate red and amber in color, move from right to left, and wobble slightly.  it then appeared to ascend at a slow rate.  the color then was steady red, first strong, then faint, back to strong and then the light just faded away as it ascended.  my only feeling during my experience was of confusion and question of what i was looking at.  it was definitely not like any aircraft i've ever observed.
content.summary: Red/amber pulsating light to the west of my position, hovered for several seconds then appeared to ascend and fade out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on i-25, just north of t or c, when i saw a yellow, golden light to the east.  after a few minutes, i saw more.  i stopped the car and watched them move for about a minute, then they went away.  i waited several minutes and they reappeared briefly.  i started driving again, and saw them one more time a few minutes later.  
  i've never seen lights of that color, and they way they moved, sometimes in a straight line, pulsating, and then appear to multiply from one, two, four, then alternate, come and go in geometric patterns.  no idea what that was, but not something i've seen before.  it was beautiful, and i felt good to see them.  they were graceful and organic in the way they moved.  tried to get a picture, and never could.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Odd group of lights sighted just after dark, moving strangely over white sands

content.detailedDescription: This afternoon i experimented with robert bingham's ufo summoning technique. i did not get any obvious results. i then walked to the store to get some food and a pair of binoculars. when i was walking home i saw a white orb moving from south to north. i then communicated with it telepathically, and asked it to come closer. then the one orb divided into a whole fleet of brilliant and spectacular white orbs/objects forming a whole fleet of about one hundred orbs, and moving from north to south. i could not believe my eyes, and stood there in total shock. this man happened to be walking by me, and i pointed to the objects. he also saw them. he just happened to have a knife, and cut open the plastic container holding my binoculars. we both looked through the binoculars and saw the ufo fleet. the whole vision lasted about four minutes. and then right before my eyes the objects vanished. i tried to record on my flip video recorder, but since it has horrible zoom, i could not see anything. i was in such an exited state anyway that i don't think i even focused on the right spot. i was too excited. i cannot even describe the shock and emotions i was experiencing.
content.summary: White orb moving north than changed directions and broke into dozens of crafts.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting on eastbound elliot off ramp from interstate 10 first in line to turn eastbound elliott.  was warching jet take off from sky harbor airport heading due east when a flat saucer shaped moved beneath the jet moving west then abruptly stopped and reversed direction 180 degrees, at a high rate of speed.  it then dropped several hundred feet and was hovering for a few seconds then moved west, stopped again and turned due east and was moving quickly and then disappeared.  

as no right turns are allowed on red lights at this exit ramp, i could concentrate on what i was watching.  

the object was very wide or long and a number of miles away.  i could not judge whether or not it was in the take off corrider for commercial jet take offs or further north.  is was to far away to take a photo using a cell phone.

i also witnessed a large white aircraft at very high altitude showing a contrail for approx 5 seconds then on and off etc at regular intervals.  it was completely different than the "donut" contrails i have seen a number of times in the metro phoenix skies.  it appeared to be a single engine aircraft moving at a rate of speed that was not unexpected.  it happened mid after noon tuesday movung south to north.  there were few clouds in the area at that time.  while not truly a ufo it did display a very unusual contrail never seen before.  jet noise could be heard but very faintly and could have been from a commercial airliner in the area.  positionwise i would estimate it parrelling between 40 street and interstate 10.  i saw this from my back yard but did not have the opportunity to take a pic or video.
content.summary: Was sitting in car and noticed "something" making non ballestic movements

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone outside - full moon, stars.  was observing orion when noticed lights (stars, i thought) moving east to west.  i called for my wife to come when lights appeared numerous and unstopping.  they flew in unison, in tight formation, several (dozen or so) dimmer lights around a central brighter light.

little cloud cover, but some lights flew under clouds, while their formation flew over clouds, always the same speed.

we heard and saw 2 commercial flights into canada, saw visible contrail in full moon light, and heard planes. also observed their flashing lights.  the lights closest to planes, stopped.  then, once planes moved past, they resumed flight - westward.

we tried to video tape, but only have small digital camera. not good video, but good audio of our reaction. during this time, we counted as many as 100 lights, but there were many more.

during event i became increasingly excited as i realized what we were witnessing. my wife brought me binoculars, but they provided little more than a closeup of a bright circle that moved steadily west.  their speed was steady, though not fast, about as fast as airliners traveled.

no planes flew in the same direction as the lights during this event.

objects flew west and we lost sight of them.  i called my pastor to describe what we saw, so someone would know.
content.summary: Lights in formation flying east to west

content.detailedDescription: Star like object during the middle ofthe day moving across the sky. this object took over 30 minutes to cross the sky. i called my sister to see if she could see it we spoke for 15 minutes but i was not able to direct her in the right direction. i am in clearfield and she was in syracuse. i have no idea what this was but i do know it take less than 30 minutes for a jet at high altitude to cross the sk y so i do not believe it was a jet. daytime satellite? daytime space station sighting? idk. unknown to me. i took pictures with my phone, but nothing worth submitting. just a small white dot.
content.summary: Star like object during the middle of the day

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were sitting on the porch and saw a boomerang shape of lights traveling through the sky.  there was a transparent like shape to it in addition to the lights.  none of us has ever seen anything like it.  it was not explainable.  then right after that one disappeared from view, another one just like it went by traveling the same path. we are just amazed at what we saw.  there is no explanation for what we saw other than it was a ufo.
content.summary: 3 of us observed this on our front porch.  2 unidentified objects in a row and then they disappeared from view.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my morning 4-mile walking exercise and was proceeding north. it was a bright sunny day with only a few cumulus clouds in the sky. abruptly to the northwest at about 35-degrees off the horizon, a moving object about the size of a beebee at arms length caught my eye. it was mostly whitish with a silvery center that seemed to glow. i presumed it was an aircraft that was reflecting the bright sunlight that was behind me. however, the object never changed shape in appearance as it traveled north-to-northeast in level flight with no contrail. the object continued to appear round and whitish in color with a highly reflective center that seemed silvery. i stood still to watch it for about 2-minutes until it disappeared behind a tree line. at all times it flew above the few clouds that were in the sky and there were no other aircraft in my view. air temperature at ground level was in the 50s at that time of day and winds were under 10 mph out of the northeast that morning. i'd estimate that the object's distance from me would be over a mile since it was further away than the nearest clouds which were about a half-mile from me to the northwest. what struck me as odd or unusual about the object was that it never changed it's apparent round shape or coloring. over the next few days i made a point of observing aircraft in the sky and it was apparent to me that they significantly change their apparent shape and the amount of light they reflect when they are at altitude and flying in bright sunlight.
content.summary: Round object traveled in level flight, no contrail and was white to silver in color with bright spectral quality to center of object

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 696 heading to farmington hills from warren mi i saw alot of stuff in the sky but just thought it was planes then im geting to the over pass before lasher and i see a black triangle ship in cristal clear detail as i got closer i realised it was not moving it was very low to the freeway less then 500 feet or it was very massive i could see detail in the ship thats how close it was i got scare4d and pulled off the road in to a gas station and i saw atleast 6 or more of the same ship with what looked like heleicopters in persuit i could easly see them because it was mostly clear out and there was a full moon so it illuminated the edges like an eclipse i had always beleaved in ufos but not untill today has it really occured to me how scary it is to see one up close and person i almosed cryed and im a growen man
content.summary: Black solid triangle the underside had 2 vertical light strips in the center like an =

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my neighbors house. object caught my eye. took pics with cell phone. got to friends house, called her outside. i began video taping. i thought maybe they were flares, but saw more than 20. you need to see the pics and video. very strange but decent clarity.Objects faded away.
content.summary: You need to see my pics and video

content.detailedDescription:
It was 11 - 12 at night. my cousin and i were parked by the van cortlandt park woods in front of his house on a dead end street when i noticed a light source coming from deep inside the woods. i took a few steps towards the gate that separated us from the woods and our parking spot. my first thought was that of an image of the eiffel tower (red exterior lights on the pointy top hovering over an orange beam.) we walk these woods all the time and we can tell you that there has never been light illuminating from inside. when you walk inside the woods, its steep downhill, but what we saw was directly at eye level, so we could only assume it was treetop. the orange beam seemed to give off an energy that would not allow my cousin and i to look away. it demanded our attention as it was the most beautiful light show we've ever seen. we were speechless. at that moment my cousin started walking closer to the gate. the closer he got to the gate and stepped on the leaves, lights changed from blue to orange to finally red. at that point we were already leaning on the gate to get a closer look. the harder we looked and tried to focus on the object the more it appeared to move closer. it moved to a point where we can see a red glare giving off from the exterior red light. the exterior red light paused from there on after. we stood there in awe. the lights had a different affect on me than they did my cousin. whatever it was, it was trying to alter what i was seeing. it was throwing different images at me and i felt like a negative energy was telling me to go away. then suddenly out of nowhere we heard a humming sound coming from that direction. we knew without a doubt it came from what we were looking at. nothing else was around and it was one of the quietest nights we've ever had near these woods. what we saw next could only be described as an indent coming from the middle of the beam. it was absorbing something slowly. we couldn't believe what we were looking at. it was like something out of the comic books. and as cliche as that sounds, bear with us, because things start to get even weirder. we start hearing footsteps running. it was approximately 15 to 20 feet away from us and gaining. we were scared to death at this point. it felt like spirits were telling us to go away. as it started to get closer it ran through our peripheral. what we saw can only be described as it appearing to be human wearing a cloaking device. their might have been more than one as the footsteps could be heard moving from the left and from the right of us. we felt them telling us to go away. its hard to explain but the shock of it all flustered our feelings and made us feel like we were invading. at this point we moved closer to our parked car which was not far from the gate. as soon as that happened something ran inside the neighbors' backyard finding an entrance through the woods. the minute the gate closed behind whatever it was, the neighbor's backyard light and inside car lights flickered on for just a second. we heard the neighbors' back door open very quietly gentle and footsteps in the house like sharp tip toeing for maybe about 10 steps as it was all done in one quick motion as if what ever it was was powered by energy and that's what flickered all the lights. it was amazing!!! like a surge of energy from a higher being triggering everything electrical around it. as if it was in the power lines! we freaked out! it left the house promptly after the footsteps and closed the door behind it again very gently and closed the gate heading back towards the woods. my cousin ran to wake up my other friend who lived in the same house as him. we needed another eye witness to make sure what we were seeing wasn't at all in our heads. we failed to bring him due to his heavy sleeping, and work in the morning status. my cousin finally came back with the bad news and by that time the footsteps were far but could be heard from a distance. my cousin climbed on the rail to lean on the gate to once again get a closer look at the object, two large stomps approached him very aggressively but yet subtly shaking the gate. he quickly jumped off in fear. we just sat there in disbelief! we couldn't believe that something like this was happening to us. we felt alone in this world even though something out of this world was just a few yards away. if you already don't believe us than you'll believe us even less when we tell you someone star like came out of this craft and started walking around. its physical form was that of a man but glowing like the sun. no eyes or mouth could be seen but he was just like a bright star! the beam widened up and then it slimmed down again. like as if it sucked him up. that was the last we saw of whatever that was. i had to pick up my mother from work soon so i had to leave, regrettably. my cousin went to sleep and neither one of us saw the craft fly off. we only we wish would've recorded whatever we saw but it was too dark for my iphone to capture anything inside these woods. we're trusting our eyes, mind and body that what we saw that night of november 3, 2014 was not a hoax but a real event that changed the view of the world for my cousin and i. 


thank you
content.summary: Vertical (color varies) light beam. pulsating red light above beam. beam seemed to widen up as it absorbed unknown (black object)

content.detailedDescription:
Is just a sensor cam got shots of alien true form weird so rounding not like mine. and few times visited me. now i have glowy hands and sparkle , also got that on camera .Rang my govt but they said they don't know what to do.
funny neither do i.
turns off equipment hurts me all times can't talk to no one bout it.
feel changes in me with marks never seen before strange writing with radio frequencies brings em out , cuz i bought one for facial and instead i saw strange writing . 
there's not many people will help me 
accept you.
i give u one film ok cuz dunno how to get other ones on tablet and complicated 
time i put isn't it 
 had to put something cua it won't let me send .
i don't know time i didn't bother to take note long as i had film
content.summary: Sensor cams got few pics strange person sorta person

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony and saw this green light hovering over the mountain. at first i thought it was a helicopter but when the object started speeding up and changing directions abruptly and in such a fashion that it would be impossible for any other aircraft to do it, then it got me curious.  the whole event lasted for about 5 minute and the light vanished behind the mountain. i was just amazed by the movements of that object, whatever it was. i would say the size of the object was 20-30 feet in diameter. maybe. it was just green light.
content.summary: Green light hovering and speeding up suddenly and changing directions abruptly

content.detailedDescription: When this was happening i was just off from my physics classes and just thoroughly noticed a flame with a higher speed like of  a helicopter apache forwarding in direction of  meerut city . firstly thought it of air balloon that we used to release on the occasion of diwali but its speed was not in accordance to it. other than me my 2 friends also noticed the same at same time in another part of the city . and i recently got to know it from other people also.
content.summary: It was glowing like a flame in sky .

content.detailedDescription:
Was in louisiana on oct. 26th.  at around noon, i was observing a vintage
b-17 fly-over when i spotted, first one then three, bright spots in the sky.
they appeared one at a time as stationary star-like objects - very hard to
see with the naked eye.  

i snapped photo but cannot make them out in it.
content.summary: Stationary, star-like objects (3) appearing one at a time on a bright blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch looking at my phone when i suddenly hear a low rumbling noise that began to slowly get louder. at first being near baton rouge with our chemical plants, i thought the noise was the plant kicking up their flame stacks to burn more chemicals. sometimes at night they do this and you can hear it for about 30 minutes to an hour. i walked out to get a better idea of which direction it was coming from and immediately noticed a group of flashing lights in the sky. i knew this couldn't be airplanes flashing in the distance because of first off the lights were in a triangle shape and they were all the same distance from me. also the lights were flashing in sequential order from left to right in perfect timing. i watched as the sound got louder and then noticed they were all moving together towards northwest from original location i spotted it in. the lights lead me to believe instead of 5 different objects, this was one very large object. as large as maybe half of my town of zachary louisiana. roughly 4 miles across. as it moved away i ran and woke my mother to have a second witness. my mom does not believe in ufos and she was also convinced it was one large triangle. as it got further away the rumbling stopped and also the front light became solid and stayed on until no lights were visible. i would love to know if anything was reported on radar being i live near baton rouge airport. this also means i am used to flashing lights from planes and also study passing satellites and orbiting rocket bodies using a sky monitoring app for satellites in the sky. lots of cloud cover tonight but clouds were very high. i did not see any single planes tonight though. these were the only lights. i always see strange objects because i watch the skys. i have seen more than one anomalies in the same direction from my front yard. but this was the first ever hearing anything and first triangle craft or at least formation.
content.summary: 5 perfectly sequential yellowish flashing lights in triangle or boomerang formation with loud rumbling sound

content.detailedDescription: On october 13th, 2014, at about 3:30 pm, i went outside the get my mail. when i started to walk back to my apartment, i felt an urge to look up in the sky. i did so, and immediately noticed a small white orb moving slowly high in the sky from east to west. it appeared to be going in a straight line. it made no noise and there was no smoke. it was a partly cloudy day, and i stared at the object as it moved closer toward the blazing sun light. one thing that is interesting about this sight, is that i was in a location where a neighbor once told me that he has seen flying rods at night. my reaction to this site was incredible. i immediately started doing research on flying orbs. something within myself tells me that this object was not man-made. it's almost as if a consciousness beckoned me to look up at the right time. i was so changed by this experience, that i have decided to purchase a good video camera.
content.summary: White orb high in sky moving from east to west. no smoke or sound.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at 245 am to smoke a butt. heard wicked loud electrical sound wondering what it was looked around just saw what i thought was the moon light till i noticed it was moving way slow. didn't have contacts in but went in and put them in looked out window could still see light but couldn't make what it was. hence the unidentifiable part. continued to hear sound as i wrote this like more than 30 min. weird man
content.summary: Loud electrical hum wicked bright very slow moving light above but angled behind trees
